### Emily S. Webber, Ph.D.


---

**Team Leadership & Development** – Proven ability to build, scale, and mentor high-performing analytics teams.

*Built and scaled a matrixed analytics team including the hiring and training of one co-director and 10+ analysts.  This team scaled from serving 2 to 65+ customers in 3 years.*

&nbsp;

**Data Science & Advanced Analytics** – Expertise in statistical modeling, machine learning, predictive analytics, and real-world data (RWD) methodologies.

*Experience building real world solutions using data science and analytics across industry verticals.* 

&nbsp;

**Healthcare & Life Sciences Research** – Deep experience applying EHR data and RWD to clinical, regulatory, and commercial studies.

*Published several papers (in press) and 10+ conference abstracts using EHR data to answer some of healthcares most pressing questions.* 

&nbsp;

**Communication & Training** – Published researcher and conference presenter; creator of training programs, webinars, online courses and other educational content for data sciencen and technical platform adoption.

*See "Workshops & Outreach" for more detalis!*

&nbsp;

**Client & Stakeholder Engagement** – Skilled at enabling clients to use complex data at scale, from custom analyses to enterprise solutions.

*Designed, built and scaled research programming using Truveta EHR data to serve some of the worlds largest life science customers.*

&nbsp;

**Cross-Functional Collaboration** – Strong track record partnering with Product, Engineering, and Customer Success to drive strategic decisions.

*Created an internal, company wide meeting called "Code & Tell" to showcase the work of individual contributors and share end user experience with technical and business leaders across departments.*

&nbsp;

**Strategic Planning & Execution** – Experienced in aligning analytics programs with organizational objectives to deliver measurable impact.

*Built a custom in-house analytics report combining data from Salesforce, Billing, and Platform usage to provide unifying intelligence into the customer experience used in a monthly "Customer Health Score".* 


&nbsp;

**Technical Expertise** – Hands-on experience with many programming languages and platforms. 

*Python, R, SQL, Spark, Databricks, SPSS, DataRobot, Truveta Studio.*
